lore: Before creating the Blood Grove, Apocranox assembled a group of humans to establish a colony in his realm. After drinking from the springs and eating the fruits that grew there, these humans became Satyrs.\n\nDue to Eft attacks, many Satyrs suffer serious injuries. Losing a limb is not uncommon in the Blood Grove, but unlike Inquisitors, Satyrs cannot regenerate. This does not stop these Satyrs from entering battle, adapting their combat form so it continues to be effective.
menagerieDialog: (It's playing a tune on a set of pipes, oblivious to your approach.)
Care to hear a new song I've written? It's called "The Art of War".
(It's busy shining its hooves with a cloth. Makes sense.)
(It's busy tap-dancing. This seems odd at first until you realize you'd do the same thing if you had hooves.)
(It's throwing a tantrum and stomping its hooves on the ground. Touchy little thing.)
name: Spry Satyr
